column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: Around Wat Phnom people with Chinese ancestors have been gathering to welcome the spirits for the upcoming new year.------Chinese custom dictates that putting raw pork onto a lion statue and cracking the egg on its teeth brings good luck
column4: happiness and success in business. The ritual also purges bad luck from the previous year.------The practice must be done in the morning
